Projects

Iâ€™ve developed a few open source projects, mostly dealing with improving workflows for documentation lookup.

  • helm-cider, an Emacs package to look up symbols, namespaces, descriptions, etc. for Clojure.
  • helm-describe-modes, an Emacs package to look up mode information. Goodbye, 20,000-character buffer from describe-mode!
  • helm-info, a tool for quickly browsing GNU Info files on your system.
